summary: Introduces a modular middleware architecture for deep agents, supporting planning, filesystem operations, and subagent task delegation.

structure.title: Deep Agents Middleware
structure.summary: Introduces the modular middleware architecture for deep agents, including planning, filesystem, and subagent capabilities.

nodes.path: middleware > Deep Agents Middleware > To-do list middleware
nodes.title: To-do list middleware
nodes.summary: Introduces the TodoListMiddleware for managing to-do lists in multi-part tasks, enhancing planning and adaptability.

nodes.path: middleware > Deep Agents Middleware > Filesystem middleware
nodes.title: Filesystem middleware
nodes.summary: Introduces FilesystemMiddleware for managing short-term and long-term memory in agents, providing tools for file operations and configuration.

nodes.path: middleware > Deep Agents Middleware > Filesystem middleware > Short-term vs. long-term filesystem
nodes.title: Short-term vs. long-term filesystem
nodes.summary: Describes how to configure a CompositeBackend for persistent storage of specific paths in the filesystem middleware.

nodes.path: middleware > Deep Agents Middleware > Subagent middleware
nodes.title: Subagent middleware
nodes.summary: Describes how to use subagents middleware to delegate tasks, maintaining clean context in the main agent. Includes examples of defining and using subagents.
